properties.headline: Flood Warning issued February 8 at 9:18AM EST by NWS Wilmington NC
properties.description:
...The National Weather Service in Wilmington NC has issued a Flood Warning for
the following rivers in North Carolina...South Carolina...

Northeast Cape Fear Near Burgaw affecting Pender County
Lynches At Effingham affecting Florence County

The National Weather Service in Wilmington NC has issued a

* Flood Warning for
The Northeast Cape Fear Near Burgaw.
* from Monday morning until further notice.
* At  8:30 AM Saturday the stage was 7.69 feet.
* Flood stage is 10.0 feet.
* Minor flooding is forecast.
* Forecast...Rise above flood stage by Monday morning and continue to rise to
near 10.9 feet by Wednesday evening. Additional rises are possible thereafter.
* Impact...At 11.0 feet...Floodwaters continue to rise and affect roads in the
River Bend and River Birch subdivisions off Highway 53 along the east bank of
the river. Portions of Croomsbridge Road and Old Maple Hill Road become
impassable.
properties.instruction:
People with interests along the river should take the necessary precautions to
protect life and property from the flood waters.

Additional information is available on our website at weather.gov/ilm under the
"Rivers and Lakes" link.
